head.citation-title: Proceeding - ICARES 2014: 2014 IEEE International Conference on Aerospace Electronics and Remote Sensing Technology
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 37 papers. The topics discussed include: a method for determining the dimension of planar monopole triangular antenna; a real-time monocular vision-based frontal obstacle detection and avoidance for low cost UAVs in GPS denied environment; a utility aircraft for remote sensing missions with a high-precision automatic flight control system; ADCS requirements of lapan-A3 satellite based on image geometry analysis; an improved local similarity measure estimation for change detection in remote sensing images; ASIGN - mission-critical visual communications for integrated space applications; attitude control of a multicopter using L1 augmented quaternion based backstepping; and attitude control of bias momentum micro satellite using magnetic and gravity gradient torque.
